EmailTemplate.description: Sent to admissions-notifications@{school} when an inactive account (Rejected/Terminated, Left) is reactivated (Applying, In School, Future Enrolment) and both the address and contact fields need to be updated
EmailTemplate.name: Sys/Adm - Inform Admissions of Inactive Account Reactivated 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Inactive Account Reactivated (Admissions Notification)
